reviews.title: Scrum master exp
reviews.pros: -work life balance -great culture -opportunities to explore and expand your knowledge

reviews.title: I will miss TA
reviews.cons: Need to work on their product.

reviews.title: Good Company Overall
reviews.pros: I really enjoyed the benefits, compensation was respectable, and the people on my team were wonderful (some of the best I've had the privilege of working alongside in my corporate career).
reviews.cons: Sometimes it felt as though leadership lacked vision (not necessarily the company leadership, but the area that I worked in) and the appropriate appetite for risk to enable a culture of innovation. There seemed to be a misalignment in priorities between focus areas and leadership often causing for excessive pivoting or work once deemed critical to be shelved. Once they tighten up the vision and take an unwavering approach to product development the sky is the limit.
reviews.advice: Get focused and let the intelligent staff you hired have the creative space to fulfill the goals outlined for the year. Be okay with making strategic investments in something that may not pay dividends today, but will bare fruit for years to come if done correctly. You can't rush quality.

reviews.title: to much pressure
reviews.pros: good bonus if you sell. good benefits.
reviews.cons: American company, doesnt care about HOW you sell, they only look at numbers. Be prepared of being fired any time.

reviews.title: Great people, not so great product
reviews.pros: Amazing people to work with Good benefits on top of your pay package
reviews.cons: Products need a massive improvement to stay relevant in the current market

reviews.title: terrible new "executive leadership team"
reviews.pros: the people, bonus is great, office location is good
reviews.cons: we got told in a 3 minute "meeting" we were being made redundant. the new management have really destroyed this company. TripAdvisor is such a hard sell now, I don't have a happy customer.
reviews.advice: just shut the place down, y'all so toxic

reviews.title: It's aight
reviews.pros: Pay is good and team is great to work with

reviews.title: Decent Pay but needs more Organization
reviews.pros: Good pay, nice people, WFH flexibility, fun products to work on. Nice benefits.
reviews.cons: Too many people in leadership are hesitant to make decisions quickly and effectively. Many teams are siloed which makes it hard to feel there is a strong, uniformed sense of culture. Their long term strategy is unclear, even though employees are proactively seeking directly, leadership is not able to answer those questions

reviews.title: Can't be great place. Sometimes too stressful but still liked working there
reviews.pros: Liked working there. Everyone is nice. Job can be fun. Pay is well. Company does care.
reviews.cons: Sometimes can be stressful especially if you are the only one in the team working on a weekend.

reviews.title: 4 stars
reviews.pros: Learning lots of skills for the future
